DataElement.preferredName: Treatment Plan First IMRT Institution Recipient Submission Ind-3b
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/not applicable indicator whether there was a submission of the treatment plan, a document outlining the essential treatment issues which will be addressed, for the person being the first at an institution to receive Intensity Modulated Radiation Therapy, an advanced form of 3-Dimensional Conformal Radiation Therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Treatment Plan First IMRT Institution Recipient Submission
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the submission of the treatment plan, a document outlining the essential treatment issues which will be addressed, for the person being the first at an institution to receive Intensity Modulated Radiation Therapy, an advanced form of 3-Dimensional Conformal Radiation Therapy.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A document outlining the essential treatment issues which will be addressed. This may include the problem to be addressed, the proposed treatment, the treatment goal, the time frame to meet goals, and an estimate of the costs.

Concepts.definition: A document outlining the essential treatment issues which will be addressed. This may include the problem to be addressed, the proposed treatment, the treatment goal, the time frame to meet goals, and an estimate of the costs.

Property.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:An advanced form of 3-Dimensional Conformal Radiation Therapy:An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research as, a literary institution; also, a building or the buildings occupied or used by such organization.:A person who gets something.:Submission; a message submitted for the judgment of others.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.

An advanced form of 3-Dimensional Conformal Radiation Therapy (3D CRT) that involves the use of varying intensities of small radiation beams to produce dosage distributions that are more precise than those possible with 3D CRT.

An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research; also used to refer to a building or buildings occupied or used by such organization.
Something submitted for the judgment or consideration of others.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 8/3/2015 Corrections made to VD in order to restore to original format: removed C49486 as rep term and replaced with C49797; restored long name and definition per Dianne Reeves/tt.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Will the treatment plan for t
ReferenceDocuments.description: Will the treatment plan for this first patient to be treated at your institution be digitally submitted to the ITC for processing in preparation for the rapid review?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: If IMRT External Beam was selected, will a treatment plan be submitted for rapid review prior to beginning any protocol therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Will IMRT treatment plans be submitted for rapid review prior to delivering any protocol therapy?

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Assessments Ind-3b 2958018v1 with VD ID#3506036 - Yes No Not Applicable Indicator - dbw
